It's Classics, Historical Fiction, Fiction written by Margaret Mitchell, and it's rating is 4.3. And here is the description: Scarlett O'Hara, the beautiful, spoiled daughter of a well-to-do Georgia plantation owner, must use every means at her disposal to claw her way out of the poverty she finds herself in after Sherman's March to the Sea.
